# a [[household]] [[utensil]] used from the 13th to the 16th century, and sometimes later, for [[storing]] and [[distribute|distributing]] [[water]]
types.html:
puisette f (plural puisettes)

  1. a household utensil used from the 13th to the 16th century, and sometimes later, for storing and distributing water
trans: a household utensil used from the 13th to the 16th century, and sometimes later, for storing and distributing water

title: puisette
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pɥi.zɛt/
